If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. // Help Click on a list entry to hear a five seconds preview of the sound. By long pressing you can open a menu. You can hear the whole track. There you can set the sound as ringtone, notification or alarm.

The chosen sound will be copied in the \"alarms, ringtones or notifications folder\" on your sd-card. After that the system settings will open where you can set the sound as ring or notification sound. The Alarm sound must be configured in the settings of your alarm app, since you can not configure this in the system settings. Here you can set a wallpaper. A long click will open the wallpaper source in your browser. You can also set a color as wallpaper. Just click the menu entry. Here you can create a ZIP-file with informations, concerning app icons you want to be themed. Send the created ZIP-file to the developer of your theme.
